name: Mobile Empire
developer: Shanghai huan zhen Info Tech Ltd
description: This may be the world's first stand-alone simulation game that can “develop a mobile phone"! There are more than 60 models for you to develop! Develop your own mobile phone now!Support sharing with IOS version of the game archive!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7（64）,Windows 8（64）,Windows 10（64） Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: 兼容DirectX声卡
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
